extension.name: GOCarousel
extension.author: Enrique Nunyez
extension.description:
GOCarousel bootstrapped for Joomla 2.5 by Grupo Odin

Must Read - New

  • Bassed on Bootstrap 3.1.1 carousel to easy implementation on Joomla. Can be deactivated via admin panel
  • jQuery 1.11 - Can be deactivated via admin panel

Admin Pannel Option Menu

  1. + 1 to 6 image chooser from your media folder ( /images )
  2. + Text caption writer: you can also put a diferent caption text over each image.
  3. + Text color picker: choose the color you want to your caption text.
  4. + Plus a Font size selector...
  5. + ... and the best five google fonts ever can be chosen
  6. + Carousel Size options: you can select the height (in pixels) and the width ( in %: 100% will be full screen width).
  7. + Carousel interval time can be changed from 1500 to 9000 milliseconds.
  8. + Script options: If you have some code problems because a jQuery or bootstrap conflicts, you can easily turn off one, both or none of them.
